a.title: Start your career with La Fe Prep!

article.class: post-18 page type-page status-publish hentry entry

p.span: Parents/Guardian: Just a reminder that we’ll have curbside meal distribution from Monday – Friday (9:00am – 11:00am). The free breakfast and lunch is be available to any child ages 1-18. The meal pick up will be on Florence St., at the side gate entrance to the cafeteria.

Padre/Tutor: Sólo un recuerdo de que tendremos distribución de desayuno y comida a través de la entrega en la puerta de la escuela “Curbside” de lunes a viernes de 9:00 am a 11:00 am. El alimento gratuito será disponible para cualquier niño o niña entre las edades de 1 a 18 años. El alimento se recogerá en la calle Florence, al lado de la puerta de entrada de la cafetería.

strong.span: In accordance to the City of El Paso’s Shelter in Place rule & CDC (Centers for Disease Control) guidelines, we have extended our campus closure until further notice. We will begin our online distance learning beginning on April 6, 2020. You will receive a call from us with further instructions later this week.

De acuerdo con la regla de Quédate en Casa de la Ciudad de El Paso y la guía de CDC (Centros de control y prevención de enfermedad), hemos tenido que extender el cierre de nuestro campus hasta nuevo aviso. Daremos comienzo de nuestro programa de aprendizaje a distancia en línea el día 6 de abril de 2020. Durante la semana, usted recibirá una llamada de nuestra parte para darle instrucciones.

p.strong: Mission Statement of La Fe Preparatory School:

p.em: La Fe Preparatory School will create and promote a positive bilingual and multicultural learning environment that will empower children to achieve the highest levels of academic, artistic, physical, and social well-being by instilling confidence and a joy for learning.

br.em: La Fe Preparatory creará y promoverá un ambiente bilingüe y multicultural positivo de aprendizaje que les permita a los niños alcanzar los más altos niveles académicos, artísticos, físicos y el bienestar social, al infundir confianza y un gusto hacia el aprendizaje.

div.p: The La Fe Preparatory School is a small campus with students in Pre-Kindergarten-6th Grade. Small classes of no more than 16 students allow each child to receive individual and personalized attention.
Students will graduate with the ability to communicate socially, academically, and professionally in both English and Spanish.

The classroom environment at La Fe allows your childs’ educators to give them the time and attention that they need in order to succeed. We believe in keeping class numbers low to maximize learning potential.

Each student has access to the best possible learning technologies, as as well having guest classes from industry professionals. We believe this better prepares your child for their careers or own businesses.

We believe in equipping your children with the skills to be able to learn for the rest of their lives! By instilling in them a method of analytical thinking, we believe they will be able to be independent thinkers and be high performers in their chosen careers.
Assignment of Accreditation Status from TEA:

div.class: wp-block-cover alignfull has-background-dim-80 has-secondary-background-color has-background-dim has-parallax has-custom-size has-custom-font

div.p: “Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow” – Anthony J. D’Angelo
“Learning never exhausts the mind” – Leonardo da Vinci
We are La Fe Prep, a place of educational excellence.
We equip your children for their chosen field of study and careers with lifelong learning skills.
